languages.text: "Простите меня! Это все морок ксеносов... даже сейчас я вижу у вас за спиной топи, где сгинул Тацит..." {n}Лицо мужчины превращается в маску боли и скорби. Он натужно кашляет и склоняется вперед, словно засыпая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Простите меня! Это все морок ксеносов... даже сейчас я вижу у вас за спиной топи, где сгинул Тацит..." {n}Лицо мужчины превращается в маску боли и скорби. Он натужно кашляет и склоняется вперед, словно засыпая.{/n}

languages.text: "I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Простите меня! Это все морок ксеносов... даже сейчас я вижу у вас за спиной топи, где сгинул Тацит..." {n}Лицо мужчины превращается в маску боли и скорби. Он натужно кашляет и склоняется вперед, словно засыпая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}

"I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}

"I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}

"I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}

languages.text: 「も、申し訳ございません！すべて異種族の幻覚です…今でもあなたの後ろに、タキタスが姿を消した沼地が見えます…」{n}男は苦痛と悲しみに顔を歪めた。彼は激しく咳をし、眠りに落ちるかのように前に倒れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「も、申し訳ございません！すべて異種族の幻覚です…今でもあなたの後ろに、タキタスが姿を消した沼地が見えます…」{n}男は苦痛と悲しみに顔を歪めた。彼は激しく咳をし、眠りに落ちるかのように前に倒れた。{/n}

languages.text: “我很抱歉！这一切都是异形造成的幻觉……即便是现在，我依然能在您身后看到塔西佗消失的那片沼泽……”{n}那人的脸被痛苦与悲伤所扭曲。他剧烈地咳嗽着，身子前倾，仿佛要陷入沉睡一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉！这一切都是异形造成的幻觉……即便是现在，我依然能在您身后看到塔西佗消失的那片沼泽……”{n}那人的脸被痛苦与悲伤所扭曲。他剧烈地咳嗽着，身子前倾，仿佛要陷入沉睡一般。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Lo siento! Es todo una ilusión xenos... Incluso ahora, veo la ciénaga donde Tacitus desapareció detrás de usted...». {n}El rostro del hombre se transforma en una máscara de dolor y pesar. Tose violentamente y cae hacia delante, como si se durmiera.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Lo siento! Es todo una ilusión xenos... Incluso ahora, veo la ciénaga donde Tacitus desapareció detrás de usted...». {n}El rostro del hombre se transforma en una máscara de dolor y pesar. Tose violentamente y cae hacia delante, como si se durmiera.{/n}

languages.text: « Je vous demande pardon ! C'est une illusion des xénos... Encore maintenant, je vois le marécage où Tacitus a disparu juste derrière vous... » {n}Une grimace de douleur et de chagrin déforme le visage de l'homme. Il tousse violemment et s'affale en avant, comme s'il s'endormait.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vous demande pardon ! C'est une illusion des xénos... Encore maintenant, je vois le marécage où Tacitus a disparu juste derrière vous... » {n}Une grimace de douleur et de chagrin déforme le visage de l'homme. Il tousse violemment et s'affale en avant, comme s'il s'endormait.{/n}

languages.text: "Es tut mir leid! Das ist alles eine Illusion der Xenos ... selbst jetzt sehe ich direkt hinter Euch den Sumpf, in dem Tacitus verschwunden ist ..." {n}Das Gesicht des Mannes verzerrt sich vor Schmerz und Trauer. Er hustet stark und sackt nach vorne, als würde er einschlafen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es tut mir leid! Das ist alles eine Illusion der Xenos ... selbst jetzt sehe ich direkt hinter Euch den Sumpf, in dem Tacitus verschwunden ist ..." {n}Das Gesicht des Mannes verzerrt sich vor Schmerz und Trauer. Er hustet stark und sackt nach vorne, als würde er einschlafen.{/n}

languages.text: "Üzgünüm! Hepsi bir zeno illüzyonuydu. Şu an bile hemen arkanızda Tacitus'un yok olduğu çalılığı görebiliyorum." {n}Adamın yüzü acı ve matem dolu bir ifadeyle çarpılıyor. Şiddetle öksürmeye başlıyor ve uyuyakalmış gibi aniden önüne doğru düşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry! It's all a xenos illusion... Even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief. He coughs violently and slumps forward as though he is falling asleep.{/n}
